doctor_1_description: A specialist psychiatrist specializing in the treatment of anxiety, depression, and trauma. Experienced in treating anxiety disorders and post-trauma.
doctor_2_description: A specialist psychiatrist in the treatment of depression, anxiety, and mood disorders. Offers a combination of psychological and pharmacological treatment.
doctor_3_description: A psychogeriatrician specializing in the treatment of post-trauma, depression, and anxiety among the elderly population.
